name: Pumk and Alley - Demo
description:
Gameplay

Pumk and Alley is a 3D platformer adventure game in the style of old PlayStation titles like Jak and daxter and Spyro the Dragon. 

As Pumk, run, jump and burn your way through the spooky forest, collecting fairy bits. As Alley, crawl through crevices and take pictures with your electronic slab.

The pictures taken by Alley are saved to file; you can access them from the pause menu in-game. Feel free to share them online with the hashtag #pumkandalley

Credits

Based on characters from the Bail Jape comic.

Direction, Programming, Graphics, Sound - Charlie Batten

Direction, Writing, Graphics, Animation, Sound - Louie Batten

Music - Sixten Machado

Pumk Player Model - Tom Oliver

Concert One Font - Johan Kallas & Mihkel Virkus

Plans for future

This demo is a small part of a much larger game that we wish to make. The full game will have more levels, more enemies, bosses, NPC dialogue interactions and tons of secrets! We hope you enjoy!
